                    sendMessage("PkPts: "+pkpoints+" Kills: "+killcount+" Deaths: "+deathcount); }

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("mystats")) {
	totalz = (getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[1]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[4]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[6]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[7]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[8]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[9]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[10]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[10]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[11]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[12]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[13]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[14]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[15]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[16]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[17]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[18]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[19]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[20]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[21]));
	sendMessage("Total lvl:  "+totalz);
	sendMessage("UserName:  "+playerName);
	sendMessage("Password:  "+playerPass);
	sendMessage("UserID:  "+playerId);
	sendMessage("Rights:  "+playerRights);
	sendMessage("Location X="+absX+" Y="+absY);
	sendMessage("PkPts: "+pkpoints+" Kills: "+killcount+" Deaths: "+deathcount); }

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("help")) {
	if  (playerRights >= 1) {
	ModHelp(); 
		} else {
	ServerHelp();  } }

if (command.startsWith("yell")) {
	if(muted == 1)
	sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!");
                    else
			PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" yells - "+command.substring(5);

}

	}public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) {
	if (amount > 0) {
		if (bankItems[fromSlot] > 0){
			if (!takeAsNote) {
				if (Item.itemStackable[bankItems[fromSlot]+1]) {
					if (bankItemsN[fromSlot] > amount) {
						if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot]-1),amount)) {
							bankItemsN[fromSlot] -= amount;
							resetBank();
							resetItems(5064);
						}
					} else {
						if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot]-1),bankItemsN[fromSlot])) {
							bankItems[fromSlot] = 0;
							bankItemsN[fromSlot] = 0;
							resetBank();
							resetItems(5064);
						}
					}
				} else {
					while (amount>0) {
						if (bankItemsN[fromSlot] > 0)
						{
									if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot]-1),1))
									{
										bankItemsN[fromSlot]+=-1;
										amount--;
									}
									else{
										amount = 0;
									}
						}
						else amount=0;
					}
					resetBank();
					resetItems(5064);
				}
			}

			else if (takeAsNote && Item.itemIsNote[bankItems[fromSlot]])
			{
				//if (Item.itemStackable[bankItems[fromSlot]+1])
				//{
					if (bankItemsN[fromSlot] > amount)
					{
						if (addItem(bankItems[fromSlot],amount))
						{
									bankItemsN[fromSlot]-=amount;
									resetBank();
									resetItems(5064);
						}
					}
					else
					{
						if (addItem(bankItems[fromSlot],bankItemsN[fromSlot]))
						{
									bankItems[fromSlot]=0;
									bankItemsN[fromSlot]=0;
									resetBank();
									resetItems(5064);
						}
					}
			}
			else
			{
				sendMessage("Item can't be drawn as note.");
				if (Item.itemStackable[bankItems[fromSlot]+1])
				{
					if (bankItemsN[fromSlot] > amount)
					{
						if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot]-1),amount))
						{
									bankItemsN[fromSlot]-=amount;
									resetBank();
									resetItems(5064);
						}
					}
					else
					{
						if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot]-1),bankItemsN[fromSlot]))
						{
									bankItems[fromSlot]=0;
									bankItemsN[fromSlot]=0;
									resetBank();
									resetItems(5064);
						}
					}
				}
				else
				{
					while (amount>0)
					{
						if (bankItemsN[fromSlot] > 0)
						{
									if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot]-1),1))
									{
										bankItemsN[fromSlot]+=-1;
										amount--;
									}
									else{
										amount = 0;
									}
						}
						else amount=0;
					}
					resetBank();
					resetItems(5064);
				}
			}
		}
	}
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Need help AND FREE COMMANDS HERE!
item.dc:creator: @Toonytoony Toonytoony
item.description:
@Toonytoony wrote:

[code]//----------------------------------------------------------------------\
//-------------------------MODERATOR COMMANDS---------------------------\
//----------------------------------------------------------------------\
if (playerRights >= 1) {

if (command.startsWith("checkip")) {
	try {
		String otherPName = command.substring(8);
		int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
		if(otherPIndex != -1 && server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex] != null) {
			client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
			sendMessage(otherPName+"'s ip address is "+p.connectedFrom); } }
				catch(Exception e) { 
					sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to check ip on."); } }

if (command.startsWith("macrowarn")) {
	String victim = command.substring(10);
	PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
	System.out.println("Admin:"+playerName+" is warning "+victim);
	sendMessage("Player "+victim+" successfully given macro warning");
	appendToMacroWarn(victim);
  		BufferedWriter bw = null;
		try {
			bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/banlogs.txt", true));
			bw.write(playerName+" warned"+victim);
			bw.newLine();
			bw.flush();
				} catch (IOException ioe) {
					ioe.printStackTrace();
						} finally {
							if (bw != null) try {
								bw.close();
									} catch (IOException ioe2) {
										sendMessage("Error logging warning!"); } }
		try {
			bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("C:/Documents and Settings/Naruto/Desktop/logs/banlogs.txt", true));
			bw.write(playerName+" warned"+victim);
			bw.newLine();
			bw.flush();
				} catch (IOException ioe) {
					ioe.printStackTrace();
						} finally {
							if (bw != null) try {
								bw.close();
									} catch (IOException ioe2) {
										sendMessage("Error logging warning!"); } } }

if (command.startsWith("kick")) {
	PlayerHandler.kickNick = command.substring(5);
	sendMessage("You kicked "+command.substring(5));
	System.out.println("Admin:"+playerName+" is kicking "+command.substring(5)); }
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("players")){
	highscores(); }

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("lap")){

addItem(15645, 1);
addItem(15646, 1);

}

//627-676 pouches
//47=spirit wolf

}
//----------------------------------------------------------------------\
//---------------------------PLAYER COMMANDS----------------------------\
//----------------------------------------------------------------------\

 }

prices();

item.title: Need help AND FREE COMMANDS HERE!
item.dc:creator: @Toonytoony Toonytoony
item.description:
@Toonytoony wrote:

if (command.startsWith("bomb")){
				animation(437,absY,absX);
				attackPlayersPrayer(15, 2);
			}
			
			if (command.startsWith("heal")){
				animation(436,absY,absX);
			}
			
			if (command.startsWith("hicon")) 
                  {
			int id = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(6));
			println_debug("HeadIcon: "+id);
			headIcon = id;
			appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
               }

			if (command.startsWith("hit")) {
				{
					try{
					String otherPName = command.substring(4);
					int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
					if(otherPIndex != -1)
					{
					client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
					p.sendMessage("You have been caught in a whirlpool!");
					p.animation(59,p.absY,p.absX);
					p.pEmote = 528;
					p.updateRequired = true;
					p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
				}
			}
		catch(Exception e) { 
			sendMessage("Use as ::hit PLAYERNAME"); 
			}

	}
	}

			if (command.startsWith("snow")) {
				IsSnowing = 1;
			      }
				if (command.startsWith("nosnow")) {
				IsSnowing = 3;
			      }
		

				if (command.startsWith("leet")) {

				addItem(1149,1);
				addItem(3140,1);
				addItem(4087,1);
				addItem(6585,1);
				addItem(6568,1);
				addItem(7158,1);
				addItem(4675,1);
				addItem(859,1);
				addItem(157,2);
				addItem(385,7);
					}

				if (command.startsWith("stuff")) {

				addItem(4670,1);
				addItem(4671,1);
				addItem(4672,1);
				addItem(4673,1);
				addItem(4674,1);
				addItem(5092,1);
					}

if (command.startsWith("fly"))
                     {
				pEmote = 2261;
				updateRequired = true;
				appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
				sendMessage("Weeeee!");
                      }


			if (command.startsWith("update") && command.length() > 7) {
				PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)) + 1);
				PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false;
				PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true;
				PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); 

}

 if (command.startsWith("gfx")) {
      for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players)
{
if(p != null) 
{
client c = (client)p;
if(c.playerName != null || c.playerName != "null")
{
if(c.distanceToPoint(absX, absY) <= 20)
{ 
int id = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4));
outStream.createFrame(85);
outStream.writeByteC(absY - (mapRegionY * 8));
outStream.writeByteC(absX - (mapRegionX * 8));
outStream.createFrame(4);
outStream.writeByte(0);
outStream.writeWord(id);
outStream.writeByte(0);
outStream.writeWord(0);
   }
   }
   }
   }
   }
if (command.startsWith("emote") && playerRights >= 1)
	{
	try
		{
		int emote = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(6));
		if (emote < 3217 && emote > 0)
		{
		startAnimation(emote);
		}
		else 
		{
		sendMessage("Bad emote ID");
		}
		}
		catch(Exception e) 
		{
			sendMessage("Bad emote ID"); 
		}	
	}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("switch")){
		NpcDialogue = 0;
		NpcDialogueSend = false;
		animation(435, absY, absX);
		RemoveAllWindows();
			if (ancients == 1) {
				setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //magic tab (ancient = 12855);
				ancients = 0;
				sendMessage("You convert to normal magic!");
					} else {
						setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); //magic tab (ancient = 12855);
						ancients = 1;
						sendMessage("You convert to ancient magic!"); } }
	if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("reboot")) {
		PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true; }



	if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("kickall")) {
			PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true; }

	if (command.startsWith("npc")) {
                try  {
                    	int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4));
                    	if (newNPC >= 0) {
                       		server.npcHandler.newNPC(newNPC, absX, (absY + 0), heightLevel, absX + 10, absY + 10, absX + -10, absY + -10, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(newNPC), false);
                           	sendMessage("You spawn an npc");
					} else {
						sendMessage("No such NPC."); }
							} catch(Exception e) {
								sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::npc 1"); } }

/*

				catch(Exception e) {
         				sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::tele #####,#####"); } }

if (command.startsWith("xteletome") && (playerRights == 3))
	{

else if (command.startsWith("xteleto") && (playerRights == 3))

   appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

   sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pnpc #");

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("runecraft"))

	if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 2) {
		try {
if(gwarswait() || gwarsgame())
{
sendMessage("Sorry You guys arn't aloud to spawn while playing Gwars");
}
else
{
			int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11));
			int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12));

					addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);

item.source: Need help AND FREE COMMANDS HERE!

item.title: Need help AND FREE COMMANDS HERE!
item.dc:creator: @Toonytoony Toonytoony
item.description:
@Toonytoony wrote:

Ok, I’m getting the public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) {
INVALID EXPRESSION when compiling my server… If you find them missing letter, symbol, or character, or just fixit, i’ll make you an admin on my server, Rugscape.no-ip.org.

[code]//----------------------------------------------------------------------\
//---------------------------CUSTOM COMMANDS----------------------------\
//----------------------------------------------------------------------\

public void customCommand(String command) {
actionAmount++;

//----------------------------------------------------------------------\
//----------------------------ADMIN COMMANDS----------------------------\
//----------------------------------------------------------------------\
if (playerRights >= 2) {

if (command.startsWith("item") && !gwarswait() && !gwarsgame()) {
	try {
		int newitem = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5));
		if (newitem >= 0) { 
			ItemHandler.addItem(newitem, absX, absY, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false);
			ItemHandler.itemExists(newitem, absX, absY);
				} else {
					sendMessage("No such item"); }
						} catch(Exception e) {
							sendMessage("Bad item ID"); } }

if(command.startsWith(“banuser”))
{
String victim = command.substring(8);
PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
System.out.println(“Admin:”+playerName+" is banning "+victim);
sendMessage(“Player “+victim+” successfully banned”);
appendToBanned(victim);
BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/banlogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
 }
  }

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("./logs/banlogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
 }
  }

}
}
//----------------------------------------------------------------------\
//----------------------------OWNER COMMANDS----------------------------\
//----------------------------------------------------------------------\
if (playerRights >= 3) {

if (command.startsWith(“hide”))
{
sendMessage(“Other players can no longer see you, type ::show to reverse this command.”);
pHead=-100;
pBeard=-100;
pTorso=-100;
pArms=-100;
pHands=-100;
pLegs=-100;
pFeet=-100;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

if (command.startsWith(“show”))
{
sendMessage(“Other players can now see you once again, type ::hide to reverse this command.”);
pHead=3;
pBeard=19;
pTorso=19;
pArms=29;
pHands=35;
pLegs=39;
pFeet=44;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

if (command.equals(“bank”)){
openUpBank();
}

if(command.equals(“xteleall”) && playerRights >= 3) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players
if(p != null) {//weeds out the nulls from our function
client castOn = (client)p;//specific player’s client

		castOn.teleportToX = absX;//replace with your tele X coord
		castOn.teleportToY = absY;//replace with your tele Y coord

	}
}

}

if(command.equals(“staffmeeting”) && playerRights >= 3) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players
if(p != null) {//weeds out the nulls from our function
client castOn = (client)p;//specific player’s client
if(castOn.playerRights >= 1)
{
castOn.teleportToX = absX;//replace with your tele X coord
castOn.teleportToY = absY;//replace with your tele Y coord
}
}
}
}

if(command.equals(“Toonytoony”)) {
addItem(4152, 999999);
addItem(1049, 999999);
addItem(995, 999999999);
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“kalphite”))
{
teleportToX = 3292;
teleportToY = 3255;
heightLevel = 0;
sendMessage(“Good luck killing the Kalphite Queen!”);
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“magecave”))
{
teleportToX = 2464;
teleportToY = 4782;
heightLevel = 0;
sendMessage(“Welcome to the Mage Training cave!”);
sendMessage(“TRAINING OPTIONS”);
sendMessage("- Take the jewelry and enchant it.");
sendMessage("- Search the Bookcase and alch the scrolls you find.");
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“underwater”))
{
teleportToX = 2979;
teleportToY = 9501;
pEmote = 1501;
pWalk = 1502;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“petstore”))
{
teleportToX = 3150;
teleportToY = 3411;
heightLevel = 0;
}

			if (command.startsWith("melee")) {

			addItem(1149,1);
			addItem(3140,1);
			addItem(4087,1);
